name: I'm Not Jelly
description:
The prototype will be available to download on October 19th

Conquer different planets at war by hacking and slashing through plant foes in roguelike style missions. Watch over your mothership to unlock, upgrade and customize Jelly characters for accomplishing objectives and defeating powerful bosses!

Nojellians Vs Plantizards
  • Combines war conquest with roguelike mechanics in procedural missions.
  • A skill-based roguelite, explore different planets composed of rooms with objectives to complete.
  • Use different Nojellian characters where each one of them has unique attacks, abilities,and skills.
  • Unique perks and skills influence each attempt, putting a twist on every action.
  • Multiple enemies with powerful champions and deadly bosses to face off against.
  • Beware of death, if defeated, the Plantizards will consume the Nojellian body and become stronger.
Win the War

Death doesn't matter to Nojellians since they cannot die and their body can be created with something like jelly, changing their special abilities and skillsets.
Experiment with unique perks and skills to influence each mission.
Select carefully your next objective as the war evolves, after a mission is lost or won a new one is generated based on the results, creating a unique narrative.

The Secrets Of the Battlefield

Watch the story happen through the environment. Events appear while in battle and after each mission as a consequence of your progress in the war.
Rescue Nojellians to aid you in your mothership, encounter strange plant creatures and alien species.
